client_description_Summary_Note:
Heikkinen Uusitalo Tolvanen and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Helsinki. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Heikkinen Uusitalo Tolvanen is a 23 year old and comes from Finland.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Heikkinen Uusitalo Tolvanen is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:

Heikkinen earned his degree from Aalto University in 2024.
